dcterms:description: The SKIN dataset is widely used for skin lesion segmentation, containing 2000 images for training and 600 images for testing, specifically aimed at melanoma detection.
dcterms:title: SKIN

dcterms:description: The BREAST dataset consists of breast ultrasound images used for breast tumor segmentation, including data from multiple sources.
dcterms:title: BREAST
